constantValues: Metadata of knowledge base (KB) articles associated with Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities.

definitions.description: Metadata of knowledge base (KB) articles associated with Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities.

members.name: knowledgeBaseRecordId

constantValues: This field will be used to store the Unique ID of the associated Knowledge Base records

members.description: This field will be used to store the Unique ID of the associated Knowledge Base records

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.name: title

constantValues: Shows the title of the knowledge base (KB) Record.

members.description: Shows the title of the knowledge base (KB) Record.

members.name: privateUrl

constantValues: Shows the internal Parature service desk URL of the knowledge base records.

members.description: Shows the internal Parature service desk URL of the knowledge base records.

members.name: publicUrl

constantValues: Shows the public Parature portal URL of the knowledge base records.

members.description: Shows the public Parature portal URL of the knowledge base records.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the knowledge base record with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the knowledge base record with respect to the base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the Knowledge Base Record with respect to the base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the Knowledge Base Record with respect to the base currency.

members.name: uniqueId

constantValues: Shows the unique ID of the linked knowledge base (KB) article.

members.description: Shows the unique ID of the linked knowledge base (KB) article.
